documentation.text:
@dev Returns true if the NFT is on auction.
 @param _auction - Auction to check.

@dev Gets the NFT object from an address, validating that implementsERC721 is true.
 @param _nftAddress - Address of the NFT.

@dev Returns current price of an NFT on auction. Broken into two
  functions (this one, that computes the duration from the auction
  structure, and the other that does the price computation) so we
  can easily test that the price computation works correctly.

@dev Computes the current price of an auction. Factored out
  from _currentPrice so we can run extensive unit tests.
  When testing, make this function external and turn on
  `Current price computation` test suite.

documentation.text:
@dev Computes the price and transfers winnings.
 Does NOT transfer ownership of token.

bid(address,uint256).details: Bids on an open auction, completing the auction and transferring  ownership of the NFT if enough Ether is supplied.

params._nftAddress: - address of a deployed contract implementing  the Nonfungible Interface.
params._tokenId: - ID of token to bid on.

cancelAuction(address,uint256).details: Cancels an auction that hasn't been won yet.  Returns the NFT to original owner.

cancelAuctionWhenPaused(address,uint256).details: Cancels an auction when the contract is paused.  Only the owner may do this, and NFTs are returned to  the seller. This should only be used in emergencies.

params._tokenId: - ID of the NFT on auction to cancel.

createAuction(address,uint256,uint256,ui.details: Creates and begins a new auction.

params._duration: - Length of time to move between starting  price and ending price (in seconds).
params._endingPrice: - Price of item (in wei) at end of auction.
params._nftAddress: - address of a deployed contract implementing  the Nonfungible Interface.
params._startingPrice: - Price of item (in wei) at beginning of auction.
params._tokenId: - ID of token to auction, sender must be owner.

getAuction(address,uint256).details: Returns auction info for an NFT on auction.

getCurrentPrice(address,uint256).details: Returns the current price of an auction.

params._tokenId: - ID of the token price we are checking.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

cancelAuction(address,uint256).notice: This is a state-modifying function that can  be called while the contract is paused.
